title: Guantánamo Judge Weighing Hearsay Statements in U.S.S. Cole Bombing Case
description: About 100 Yemeni witnesses are unavailable for the trial for the 2000 terrorist attack. Now, a military judge must decide how much hearsay testimony to allow in the death-penalty case.
category: United States Defense and Military Forces
media:credit: Lyle G. Becker/U.S. Navy via Getty Images
media:description: U.S. security personnel patrolling past the Navy destroyer Cole after it was damaged in a terrorist attack on Oct. 12, 2000.
